downloadDescription: Microsoft Visio demo content pack can be downloaded by partners, customers and enthusiasts to get a good understanding of various compelling capabilities that Visio 2010 has to offer.

downloadFile.name: Visio 2010 Demo Content Pack Setup Instructions.pdf

detailsSection: Whether you’re creating an org chart, network diagram, business process, or a more technical drawing, Visio 2010’s new tools and intuitive interface make it easy to visually bring your dynamic information to life and share with others. Microsoft Visio demo content pack is intended to help partners, customers and enthusiasts gain deeper insight into key Visio use cases.
detailsSection_file_name: Visio 2010 Demo Content Pack Setup Instructions.pdf
systemRequirementsSection:
• Windows Server 2008 R2 (SP1 recommended) with the Hyper-V role enabled.
• Drive Formatting: NTFS
• Processor: Intel VT or AMD-V capable
• RAM: 8 GB or more recommended
• Hard disk space required for install: 100 GB
• Hyper V or Virtual machine downloaded from http://www.microsoft.com/download/en/details.aspx?displaylang=en&id=27417
installInstructionSection:
• Start the 2010 Information Worker Demonstration and Evaluation Virtual Machine (SP1) (Download here)
• Download and unzip the files
• Open ISO folder and run the AutoRun.bat
• Follow the instructions to install the content pack
